This website provides supplementary figures, data and checkpoint to the paper "On the calibration of powerset speaker diarization models".
The structure of the paper is as follow:

1. Introduction
2. [Model calibration](calibration.qmd)
3. Annotation-efficient domain adaptation
   1. [Finding a minimal training subset](finetuning.qmd)
   2. [Finding a minimal validation subset](validation.qmd)
4. Conclusion

Sections with an hyperlink contain supplementary material. Due to interactive figures, some pages weigh a few megabytes.
